Hariharamoorthi S
Senior Backend Developer @ SMARTBORN SOFTWARE
CONSULTING | Expertise in building Large-Scale & Enterprise-Level
Applications with Spring Boot, Java, Node.js, MongoDB, AWS
Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu, India
Summary
Graduated with a Master of Computer Applications (MCA) from
VSB Engineering College, India, in 2015. Currently contributing as
a Senior Backend Developer at SMARTBORN Software Consulting
Pvt. Ltd., focusing on a large-scale e-commerce application
connecting rural communities with kirana stores.  
Skilled in backend development with expertise in technologies like
Node.js, MongoDB, and AWS. Passionate about delivering scalable
and efficient software solutions, with a strong focus on addressing
challenges specific to the e-commerce domain.
Experience

Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
I am working on a large-scale e-commerce application that connects people
with kirana stores in rural areas.

Bengaluru, Karnataka, India

JavaScript, and React.
